channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai finds her cousin Nuku with his girlfriend, a P?keh? girl. Wai and Nuku argue and Nuku lets a secret slip. His girlfriend is pregnant. Wai is angry and sends Nuku back to the feast. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai takes a dip in the creek. Ngaru and Mihi join her. They all waste more time playing. Elsewhere, the Farmers are almost at the village. The girls are officially running late. Wai shares her anxiety about the stories of what happened to other villages during and since the wars. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: When an old ponaturi warrior outsmarts the group and escapes, Rangi blames herself and dives into the dangerous waters to follow it to its underwater lair. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Still trying to make up for her mistake, Rangi calls on mysterious friends in the mist to help them trick the ponaturi and get the godstick back. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The tupu are dying and Tai pushes past her fear of her matakitetanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The kids prank Grace to leave their farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai tries to figure out why the tupu are still dying. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Life In The FFN
channel.desc: See the stories of people who are at different stages of 'rangatiratanga' in their community. Derek Ashley works to change the narrative of his community. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Sarah looks at how k?rero tukuiho and the world of environmental science has helped her understand climate change. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: Tash is a dedicated mum of five who wants to know how best to support her tamariki, particularly her seven-year-old son Jesse who is very active and always on the go. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Alien Weaponry: Kua Tupu Te Ara
channel.desc: PREMIERE: Brothers Henry and Lewis de Jong, aka Alien Weaponry, are rewriting what it means to be metal, with te reo M?ori anthems channelling the power and pride of their culture.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, Hawaiian Canoe Adventures, and Waka Abel Tasman. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Whang?rei to uncover the story behind the sacred maunga Parihaka. (R).

channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: NEW: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live.

channel.title: Darwin and Newts

channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.title: Te Ao with Moana

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: On his birthday, P?p? H?ne drives the wh?nau to Cape Reinga, where the tamariki lead out the Toit? te Tiriti march. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hui Hoppers
channel.desc: The pou of the marae kitchen has passed away, so it is all hands on deck to bid farewell to the former head ringawera. Anahera and Kura put their differences aside to care for their haukainga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy is on Aotea exploring what it means to create opportunities on a remote island with limited resources, and how it feels to come back home. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Celebrating M?ori hunter-gatherers from all around Aotearoa. Shannon Neho heads to Motu K?kako hoping to catch a Kingfish; Korey and his whanau are out in Mangamaunu for a pig hunt. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is in the small West Coast town of Ross with well-known helicopter operators, the Newton family. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: Combining his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting, All Black Piri Weepu sets out on a tour around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.desc: This latest instalment in the popular Wild City franchise takes us into the fascinating secret world of insects and tiny creatures. Narrated by British naturalist Nick Baker. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community. (R).

channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: Hosea takes the team to a marae in order to reconnect and regroup ahead of the big grudge match against Poverty Bay. (R).

channel.title: Heritage Rescue
channel.desc: Brigid Gallagher travels NZ to visit a different heritage site each episode. Along with her team, Brigid gets the exhibition organised, creating new exhibits and uncovering fascinating stories. (R).

channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.desc: Ten iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: This episode explores composer Dame Gillian Whiteheads diverse and innovative career that blends T?onga Puoro and traditional musical compositions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A fresh voice in Autaia, Massey High navigates its cultural journey through the lens of early M?ori and P?k?h? encounters during Te Tiriti o Waitangi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Massey brings a historic lens to the stage with a performance that examines early bicultural relationships. It is challengeing and expressive in form and delivery. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Horomona Horo shares his m?tauranga and insights into his experiences within te ao taonga puoro. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew visits an Anishinaabe bush-man seeking to ?re-teach? his people the traditional ways of living off the land, visits Metis bush-meat gourmet in Manitoba, and goes late-night spear-fishing for salmon on a Cape Breton river.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: NEW: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. Pio discovers a modern, innovative and stylish modular housing approach to kainga whenua development. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Something For The People
channel.desc: A weekly Live Breakfast and late-night M?ori satire show, that combines Whakaata M?ori Te Ao News, Arataua's Haka Yarns, and Code (for the old people) all into one. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: The best Euchre players from Tainui battle it out for the title of Uka champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Pio Terei hosts this new series that captures the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua, starting with his own tiny whare. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Eugene Temara shares his insights into the world of M?ori music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Takaro Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 years olds. Series 4 focuses on the environment and the Takaro Tribe become baby eco warriors, carrying magical backpacks. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: The Afterlife. A variety of views will be shared about where our loved ones dwell in the afterlife, from the realm of Hinenuitep? to the many levels of heaven. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Vaa Voyagers Conquering The Hawaiki Nui
channel.desc: With Hawaiki Nui Va'a race fast approaching, the team are in Te Tii, but injuries plague the team, and they soon realise just getting to the start line is one of their biggest challenges. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ahikaaroa
channel.desc: Featuring Te Ahikaaroa, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: Five young friends and flatmates grapple with what it means to be Maori in the 2020s.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: Aniwa introduces his wh?nau, hangs out with icons house mother, Jaycee, and Lea Pao, Queen of Tonga, then heads to Wellington to meet gay couple R?w? and Frankie who are trying to have a baby. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley
channel.desc: At the Gate Unleashed: H?ni struggles to maintain control as the young Taik?k? grow restless and a lost treasure is unearthed. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Two brothers scare Haki, but Geo pushes back. Reality slaps Haki in the face and Te Ururangi is invited to a w?nanga in the ngahere. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Green
channel.desc: An estranged father and daughter, both with life altering illnesses, smoke marijuana together for the first time and it becomes healing in more ways than one. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Song for Serbia
channel.desc: Two sisters decide to escape lockdown and are picked up by a couple of unlikely locals. The couple reveal their true intentions, which is not at all what the sisters expected. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. This episode explores the unique problems Covid-19 posed for both the homeless community and those seeking to help them. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. At an amazing drop in centre in South Auckland, an unlikely love story shows how people's lives can be transformed by the power of a community that cares. (R).

channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
